attributes.action: Throw the full weight of government support behind a home nations football tournament in Summer 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the dissapointment of failure of the qualification for all the Home Nations football teams, it would be great to see our own tournament played in the summer. Not only would this be an excellent showcase for our beautiful game, but also assist the many businesses who invest in the national teams, who are losing an important stream of revenue next year.

Although it is understood that the government has no direct influence, an offer of support would lend huge weight to the campaign.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
